physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 10 x 14 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Written on the front of the photograph: ''January Class 1926 Aaron Gove School Denver, Colo. - Alex Martin Photo-R.'' Handwritten signatures on the back of the photograph: ''Property of - Ruth Richman, Ailsa Jane Rice, Frank Cook, Jean Hinman, Annella Richie, Hugh Atthouse, Margaret Hoke, Chester Yauase, Tom Dimelle, John Barues, Natalie Tappe, Stanley Drexler, Winifred Watson, Charles Maddock, Harvey Marsh, Philip Brickler, Lloyd Craft, Francella Winchell, Pauline Gordon, Billy Plunckett, Walter Clarkson, Marvin Schwartz, Guy Justis, Jack Pickman, Harold Lehmann, Robert M Korb, Frances Tannenbaum, Doris McDougall, Betty Pollard, Helen Rosenthal, Celia Athivaick, Hermina Kahn, H. G. Wilford, Frances E. Parker, Eleanore Moffett, Doris Baldwin, Claire Stong (Yem), Mary P. C. Taylor, Lottie Hillerstein, Marlene Chamberlain (head girl), Hello, Virginia Vance, Royden Marsh Esq., Ellenore Kirchner, Wilson Evans, Marguerite Fry, Helen Hanley, Nelle L. French, Clara M. Kean (Bob), Mary E. Biggs, Thelma Page 'pet'.'' Handwritten on back of photograph: "Aaron Gove Jr. High School January Class 1926, Front row, 9th from left Sara Back, 10 '' '' Lottie Hillerstein Marx, 3rd from right Marvin Schwartz, 2nd row, 6th from R Helen Rosenthal Steinberg, 7 '' '' Celia Atlivaick Meyers, 8 '' '' Ruth Richman Golden, 9 '' '' Pauline Gordon, 10 '' '' Helen Zelenbroff, 3rd row, 8th from left, Charlotte Seyal Spiegelman, #403.''

mods.abstract: A group of students posed in front of Aaron Gove Junior High School located at Colorado Blvd and 14th Ave, Denver, Colorado. Eight students are identified on the back of the photograph: Front row ninth from left Sara Back, tenth from left Lottie Hillerstein Mapp, third from right Marvin Schwartz; Second row sixth from right Helen Rosenthal Steinberg, seventh from right Celia Atlivaick Meyers, eighth from right Ruth Richman Golden, ninth from right Pauline Gordon, tenth from right Helen Zelenhoff; third row eighth from left Charlotte Seyal Spiegelman. Several people signed the back of the photograph: Ailsa Jane Rice, Frank Cook, Jean Hinman, Annella Richie, Hugh Atthouse, Margaret Hoke, Chester Yauase, Tom Dimelle, John Barues, Natalie Tappe, Stanley Drexler, Winifred Watson, Charles Maddock, Harvey Marsh, Philip Brickler, Lloyd Craft, Francella Winchell, Pauline Gordon, Billy Plunckett, Walter Clarkson, Marvin Schwartz, Guy Justis, Jack Pickman, Harold Lehmann, Robert M. Korb, Frances Tannenbaum, Doris McDougall, Betty Pollard, Helen Rosenthal, Celia Atlivaick, Hermina Kahn, H. G. Wilford, Frances E. Parker, Eleanore Moffett, Doris Baldwin, Claire Stong, Mary P. C. Taylor, Lottie Hillerstein, Marlene Chamberlain, Virginia Vance, Royden Marsh Esq., Ellenore Kirchner, Wilson Evans, Marguerite Fry, Helen Hanley, Nelle L. French, Clara M. Kean, Mary E. Biggs, Thelma Page.
